message:
आई.आई.टी खड़गपुर के सभी विद्यार्थियों एवं शिक्षकगणों को 66वें स्थापना दिवस की ढेरों बधाईयाँ | 65 वर्ष पूर्व आज ही के दिन इस महान संस्थान का शिलान्यास मौलाना अबुल कलाम आज़ाद के हाथों हुआ था और आज ही के दिन उस उम्मीद का भी शिलान्यास हुआ था जो भारत को विज्ञान और तकनीक के माध्यम से दोबारा विश्व गुरु बना सकता है | जवाहरलाल नेहरू की उम्मीदों का हाथ थामे, आई.आई.टी. खड़गपुर, तीव्र इच्छा-शक्ति के साथ भारत निर्माण के दिशा में उठाया गया पहला कदम था | इसके बाद कई और आई.आई.टी. बनाये गए अर्थात इस दिन को सभी आई.आई.टियों का प्रातिबिंबीक स्थापना दिवस भी माना जा सकता है | 
आवाज़, आई.आई.टी. खड़गपुर इस शुभ अवसर पर उन सभी लोगों को अभिवादन करता है जिन्होंने औपचारिक अथवा अनौपचारिक तौर पर आई.आई.टी. केजीपी के निर्माण में योगदान दिया तथा आई.आई.टी. खड़गपुर के सुगम भविष्य की कामना करता है |

Career Development Center introduced a new system of CV generation for the Internships and Placements 2016-17 this year. Right from the inception, students have been facing many problems with this system and CDC has taken many timely inputs from the students and has made an ample number of changes in the system till date, but it is not up to the mark and the students are still struggling with this method. It has now reached the level of higher complexity. We have decided to take up this issue and we request the Placement Junta to participate in this survey and help us to raise this important issue as the deadline of registration is approaching fast (22nd Aug) . We'll be sending the analysis  of this survey to the concerned authorities for the necessary actions.
http://tinyurl.com/hdjalm5

The students of IIT Kharagpur have taken an initiative to celebrate Independence Day with the deprived children of village Soladhar, around 1.5 km from Prem Bazaar gate. Students collected fund themselves and visited villages to celebrate Independence Day with those children. 
This independence day, Students of IIT Kharagpur organized a Prabhat Pheri and encouraged villagers to join them. They unfurled flag, sung patriotic songs, cheered them for their performance and gave speeches to motivate to learn and be health conscious. Sweets, Fruits, Biscuits, Notebooks and pens were also distributed afterwards.
This social work has been undertaken by Hemant Singh,  Sushant Suman,  Ajay Kumar Singh, Deepak Verma, Amit Kumar Das, Tapasya Singh, Vishal Singh, Ashwinikant Tiwari, Yashwant Singh, Jagannath and some other students.
Awaaz,IIT Kharagpur wishes such attempts be taken on a regular basis for the benefits of the society.

Independence Day Schedule

Venue : Bidhan Chowk

08:56 am - Arrival of the Director
08:58 am - General Salute by IIT Security & NCC Cadets.
09:00 am - Unfurling of National Flag by Director followed by National Anthem.
09:03 am - Director Inspects the Guard of Honour
09:07 am - Oath Taking Ceremony
09:10 am - Address by the Director
There are other programs as well. You can check it on this poster.

Awaaz, IIT Kharagpur wishes everyone Happy Independence Day.

"He is the son of the nation and we want him to make the entire country proud"

This is what parents of one  fresher said. Awaaz interacted with few parents and freshers and asked them a few questions about the campus and expectations here at KGP.

Awaaz is recruiting First and Second Years on 12th August .
Register at : http://bit.ly/joinawaaz .

The deadline for registration for final placements 2016-17 is extended up to midnight of 22nd August 2016. The final dates of first Pre-Assessment test are 27th and 28th August 2016.

message:
Hola Freshers!! 
The Campus Media Body "Awaaz" is organising an Introductory Seminar for freshers! Be there to get an insight on our activities and achievements, and how and why to be a part of our family!
Date : 7th August
Time : 6:30 pm
Venue : Kalidas Auditorium 
Be there!
